setlang.unavailable_language: The selected language is incorrect or not supported.

setlang.default_message_options:
{{e.Animated.SaphireReading}} | Hello, how are you? You can choose from 6 different languages so that I know how to speak with you.
You can choose **"Portuguese (`pt-BR`), English (`en-US`), Japanese (`ja`), French (`fr`), Spanish (`es-ES`)** and **German (`de`)**.

setlang.fail_change: {{emoji}} | Unfortunately, it was not possible to edit your language, you can try again in a few seconds?
